messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] work at home
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/27/2000 6:33:58 PM US Mountain Standard Time, moocow@gpcom.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/27/2000 6:33:58 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
moocow@... writes:

<< There are some church related organizations still around that help mothers
to get back on their feet. Not enough, but some. Check in to these and
find help. >>

Thanks for this info... It's nearly 9pm here so too late to call tonight, but
I'm going to call a couple of churches in the area tomorrow to find out if
they have any programs to help support women in these situations. I have no
problem helping out other women when I'm in a position to do so.

Dawn F
